import { Card, ListGroup, Navbar, Container, Nav } from "react-bootstrap"; import SubSidebar from "./SubSidebar"; import User from "./User"; import { Link, NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Sidebar.css"; import { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { DataContext } from "../../Data/DataContext"; function Sidebar() { const [nav, setNav, admin, setAdmin] = useContext(DataContext); if (!(window.innerWidth <= 800) && !(window.innerHeight <= 600)) return ( setNav("Home")} to="/home" activeStyle={{ fontWeight: "bold", color: "red", }} exact={true} > setNav("Advertisement")} to="./ads" activeClassName="active-home" > setNav("Manage Clinics")} to="./clinic" activeClassName="active-home" > setNav("Manage Users")} to="./user" activeClassName="active-home" > setNav("Manage Admins")} to="./admin"> ); else return (
setNav("Home")} to="/home" activeStyle={{ fontWeight: "bold", color: "red", }} exact={true} > setNav("Advertisement")} to="./ads" activeClassName="active-home" > setNav("Manage Clinics")} to="./clinic" activeClassName="active-home" > setNav("Manage Users")} to="./user" activeClassName="active-home" > setNav("Manage Admins")} to="./admin">
); } export default Sidebar;
